item.text: When it was early in the morning, all the chief priests and the elders of the people plotted against Jesus to execute him.
They tied him up, led him away, and handed him over to Pilate the governor.
Now when Judas, who had betrayed him, saw that Jesus had been condemned, he regretted what he had done and returned the 30 silver coins to the chief priests and the elders,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “I have <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st> by <st data-num="3860" class="">betraying</st> <st data-num="121">innocent</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>!” <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> is that <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>? <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="3708">take care</st> of it yourself!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> Judas <st data-num="4496" class="">threw</st> the <st data-num="694">silver coins</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="402" class="">left</st>. <st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="565">went out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="519">hanged</st> himself.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="694" class="">silver</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “It <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1832" class="">lawful</st> to <st data-num="906" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="2878">temple treasury</st>, <st data-num="1893" class="">since</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> <st data-num="5092" class="">money</st>.”

After<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4824">consulting together</st> they <st data-num="59" class="">bought</st> the <st data-num="2763">Potter’s</st> <st data-num="68" class="">Field</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="5027">burial place</st> for <st data-num="3581" class="">foreigners</st>.

<st data-num="1352">For this reason</st> <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="68" class="">field</st> has been <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> the “<st data-num="68">Field</st> of <st data-num="129" class="">Blood</st>” <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4594">this day</st>.
Then what was spoken by Jeremiah the prophet was fulfilled: “They took the 30 silver coins, the price of the one whose price had been set by the people of Israel,
and they gave them for the potter’s field, as the Lord commanded me.”
Then Jesus stood before the governor, and the governor asked him, “Are you the king of the Jews?” Jesus said, “You say so.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1722">when</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="2723" class="">accused</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>, he did <st data-num="3762" class="">not</st> <st data-num="611" class="">respond</st>.

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3756" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="4214" class="">how many</st> <st data-num="2649" class="">charges</st> they are <st data-num="2649">bringing against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”
But he did not answer even one accusation, so that the governor was quite amazed.
During the feast the governor was accustomed to release one prisoner to the crowd, whomever they wanted.

<st data-num="5119">At that time</st> they <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> in custody a <st data-num="1978" class="">notorious</st> <st data-num="1198" class="">prisoner</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">named</st> <st data-num="2424">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="912" class="">Barabbas</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> after <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> had <st data-num="4863" class="">assembled</st>, <st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Whom</st> do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> me to <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="912" class="">Barabbas</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> who is <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>?”<n id="2" />

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> he <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> they had <st data-num="3860" class="">handed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3860">over</st> <st data-num="1223">because</st> <st data-num="1223">of</st> <st data-num="5355" class="">envy.)</st><n id="1" />

<st data-num="2521" class="">As</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="968">judgment seat</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st> <st data-num="649">sent a message</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st><n id="4" /> “Have <st data-num="3367" class="">nothing</st> to do with <st data-num="1565" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">innocent</st> man;<n id="5" /> I have <st data-num="3958" class="">suffered</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">greatly</st> as a result <st data-num="2596" class="">of</st> a <st data-num="3677" class="">dream</st><n id="6" /> <st data-num="1223" class="">about</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st> <st data-num="3982" class="">persuaded</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowds</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="154">ask for</st> <st data-num="912" class="">Barabbas</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> to have <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="622" class="">killed</st>.

The<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2232" class="">governor</st> <st data-num="611" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Which</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> do you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> me to <st data-num="630" class="">release</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?” <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="912">Barabbas</st>!”

<st data-num="4091" class="">Pilate</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="3767">Then</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> should I <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> with <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> who is <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>?”<n id="1" /> They <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4717">Crucify</st> him!”<n id="2" />
He asked, “Why? What wrong has he done?” But they shouted more insistently, “Crucify him!”

When Pilate saw that he could do nothing, but that instead a riot was starting, he took some water, washed his hands before the crowd and said, “I am innocent of this man’s blood. You take care of it yourselves!”

<st data-num="611">In<n id="1" /> reply</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st>, “Let <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> be <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st>!”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="630" class="">released</st> <st data-num="912" class="">Barabbas</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> after he had <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5417" class="">flogged</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3860" class="">handed</st> him <st data-num="3860">over</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> be <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="2232">governor’s</st> <st data-num="4757" class="">soldiers</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4232" class="">governor’s</st> <st data-num="4232" class="">residence</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="4863" class="">gathered</st> the <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="4686" class="">cohort</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1562" class="">stripped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> and <st data-num="4060" class="">put</st> a <st data-num="2847" class="">scarlet</st> <st data-num="5511" class="">robe</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4060">around</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> after <st data-num="4120" class="">braiding</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="4735" class="">crown</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="173" class="">thorns</st>,<n id="2" /> they <st data-num="2007" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>. They<n id="3" /> put a <st data-num="2563" class="">staff</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188">right hand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1120">kneeling down</st> <st data-num="1715" class="">before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, they <st data-num="1702" class="">mocked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him:</st><n id="5" /> “<st data-num="5463">Hail</st>, <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>!”<n id="6" />

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1716" class="">spat</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="2563" class="">staff</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5180" class="">struck</st> him repeatedly<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st>.
When they had mocked him, they stripped him of the robe and put his own clothes back on him. Then they led him away to crucify him.
As they were going out, they found a man from Cyrene named Simon, whom they forced to carry his cross.

They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">called</st> <st data-num="1115" class="">Golgotha</st><n id="2" /> (<st data-num="3739">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">means</st> “<st data-num="5117">Place</st> of the <st data-num="2898" class="">Skull”)</st><n id="3" />

and <st data-num="1325" class="">offered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3631" class="">wine</st> <st data-num="3396" class="">mixed</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="5521" class="">gall</st> to <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> after <st data-num="1089" class="">tasting</st> it, he <st data-num="2309" class="">would</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4095" class="">drink</st> it.
When they had crucified him, they divided his clothes by throwing dice.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st> they <st data-num="2521">sat down</st> and <st data-num="5083">kept guard</st> over <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>.

<st data-num="1883" class="">Above</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">head</st> they <st data-num="2007" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="156" class="">charge</st> against <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> which <st data-num="1125" class="">read:</st><n id="3" /> “<st data-num="3778">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> of the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>.”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st> <st data-num="3027" class="">outlaws</st> were <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="2176" class="">left</st>.

Those<n id="1" /> who <st data-num="3899">passed by</st> <st data-num="987" class="">defamed</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2795" class="">shaking</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2776" class="">heads</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “You who can <st data-num="2647" class="">destroy</st> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3618" class="">rebuild</st> it <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5140" class="">three</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st>, <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="2597">come down</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st>!”

<st data-num="3668">In<n id="1" /> the same way</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="749">chief priests</st>—together <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st><n id="3" />—were <st data-num="1702" class="">mocking</st> him:<n id="4" />

“He <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="243" class="">others</st>, but he <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st>! He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> the <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>! If he <st data-num="2597">comes down</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4716" class="">cross</st>, we will <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>!
He trusts in God—let God, if he wants to, deliver him now because he said, ‘I am God’s Son’!”
The robbers who were crucified with him also spoke abusively to him.
Now from noon until three, darkness came over all the land.
At about three o’clock Jesus shouted with a loud voice, “Eli, Eli, lema sabachthani?” that is, “My God, my God, why have you forsaken me?”

When<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> of the <st data-num="2476">bystanders</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> it, they <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="3778">This man</st> is <st data-num="5455" class="">calling</st> for <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st>.”

<st data-num="2112" class="">Immediately</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5143" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">got</st> a <st data-num="4699" class="">sponge</st>, <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> it with <st data-num="3690" class="">sour wine</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4060" class="">put</st> it <st data-num="4060">on</st> a <st data-num="2563" class="">stick</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="4222" class="">gave</st> it to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4222">to drink</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="863" class="">Leave</st> him <st data-num="863">alone</st>! Let’s <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="2243" class="">Elijah</st> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> to <st data-num="4982" class="">save</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2896">cried out</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> and <st data-num="863">gave up</st> his <st data-num="4151">spirit</st>.

<st data-num="2400">Just then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3485" class="">temple</st> <st data-num="2665" class="">curtain</st><n id="2" /> was <st data-num="4977" class="">torn</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1417" class="">two</st>, <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="509" class="">top</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2736" class="">bottom</st>. The<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="4579" class="">shook</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4073" class="">rocks</st> were <st data-num="4977" class="">split apart</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3419" class="">tombs</st> were <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st> of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st> who had <st data-num="2837" class="">died</st><n id="1" /> were <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>.

(They<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1831">came out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tombs</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">after</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1454" class="">resurrection</st> and <st data-num="1525" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1718" class="">appeared</st> to <st data-num="4183">many people</st>.)

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> when the <st data-num="1543" class="">centurion</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> who <st data-num="5399" class="">were</st> <st data-num="5083" class="">guarding</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="4578" class="">earthquake</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> what <st data-num="1096">took place</st>, they were <st data-num="4970" class="">extremely</st> <st data-num="5399" class="">terrified</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="230">Truly</st> <st data-num="3778">this one</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>!”

<st data-num="4183" class="">Many</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1135" class="">women</st> who had <st data-num="190" class="">followed</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st> and given <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1247" class="">support</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>, <st data-num="2334" class="">watching</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="3113" class="">distance</st>.
